thread.title: Apple’s News is the Latest in a Trend Toward Distributed Content
thread.title_full: Apple’s News is the Latest in a Trend Toward Distributed Content

title: Apple’s News is the Latest in a Trend Toward Distributed Content
text: Print Page by: Benjamin Mullin | Poynter Today’s release of iOS 9 will see the debut of News, the much-anticipated content recommendation app that has been hailed alternatively as a rival to Flipboard and as a potential replacement for every other news app. Content from more than 50 publishers will be accessible through News, and when the app automatically appears on home screens worldwide, news organizations will quickly be exposed to an audience numbering in the millions.
